description: When the conference lights go down, the real crypto social begins Liquid Till Dawn is BitMart s official Consensus Hong Kong Afterparty, co-hosted with MetaEra, bringing together founders, investors, traders, KOLs, and builders for a night where real connections happen beyond the conference floor Step into Boomerang (The Illusionist) - ranked #43 in DJ Mag s Top 100 Nightclubs 2025 - for an immersive, high-energy experience featuring DJ spinning Drum & Bass House Techno Enjoy free-flow premium drinks all night and a room full of decision-makers - where partnerships, collaborations, and the next big move can start naturally Come for the vibe. Stay for the people. Leave with connections that move fast - just like this market Date & Time: Feb 11, 2026 22:00 02:00 Venue: LKF, Central, Hong Kong Private party invited and approved guests only. Luma approval does not guarantee entry. First come, first served. Host: BitMart - Website Twitter The premier global digital asset trading platform. With millions of users worldwide and ranked among the top crypto exchanges on CoinGecko, BitMart currently offers 1,700 trading pairs with some of the lowest trading fees in the industry. Constantly evolving and growing, BitMart is interested in crypto s potential to drive innovation and promote financial inclusion.
